creator: PanaTech Apps
descriptionHtml:
E-Library is a Project of core concept by Hostrings Technology USA,
Educational Mobile Application that mean easy to access in any where.
Adamjee Sindhi Complete App is best Sindhi application in the google play. its covered many topics for Secondary and secondary Sindhi students and teachers.

more than 80 topics included in Sindhi app, Students will cover the major topics for preparation of thier exams.

App has cover major sixteen categories that covered with possible exam questions, Sindhi practical and tutorials.

Sindhi lover like our app that definite love this app. for students writing exam like Sindh Board, Punjab Board, Karcahi Board, Major of Pakistan Board, this app is for you.

Adamjee Coaching Centre Sindhi Notes following topic are covered for IX Science Students.
01 MCQ
02 Que and Ans
03 Word Meaning
04 Opposite Words
05 Masculine / Feminine
06 Singular and Plural
07 Grammar
08 Essay
09 Application
10 Letter
11 Comprehension
12 Summary
13 Translation
14 Sindhi Alphabets
15 Meaning
16 Five Years Paper

Disclaimer: The question and solution section uses Past Secondary Board exam questions and solutions which were provided in this App for students planning to sit for Karachi Secondary Board exams

We are always in the look out on how to improve our apps. If you have any suggestion or question about this app, please kindly use the email below to get in touch with us.

Adamjee coaching centre is located in Karachi’s many areas. Adamjee Coaching was founded in 1995. It has twenty three campuses (branches) in Karachi. The coaching centre gets ready students of final board examinations through capable teachers. This is a largest coaching network in Karachi. There are experienced holder teachers available to all time. Hare the student of class X, IX, IXI, B.Com. Part I and B.Com. Part II, prepare of the final board exams. In the coaching studied Matric Science, Pre-Engineering, Pre-Medical, Arts and commerce. It is an institution where children receive a good education with the position. Its coaching given that excellence education to student’s nearby. Education provided in a fresh, satisfactory and observation of highly educated teachers is the main aim. Student and young generation learn this coaching center and prepare to final board examinations. Adamjee Coaching centre provide notes to students for preparation of exams.
